TopicTitle: Seeking Brazilian Portuguese Translation for KSP 1 Console Version: A Call to Developers and Fans for Assistance

Articles.Content: Hello everyone, I recently bought KSP 1 on console and got frustrated because there is no Brazilian Portuguese (PT-BR) translation. The game is for my nephew, who obviously doesn't speak English. I would like to know if there is any interest from the developers in releasing a translation for the console version, even if it's a fan-developed translation, or if there's anything I can do. Can someone help me?
